item.title: Report X-2023101345

Report X-2023101345

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-18
  • City: TACOMA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: As the package was being unloaded, the package handler noticed the box was wet. DescribePack: Loose cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Once the package was discovered the package was placed inside a tote, taken to the damaged hazmat cage, and set under the vent.

item.title: Report X-2023090468
item.description:
Report X-2023090468

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-08
  • City: SEATTLE
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Diesel fuel was observed leaking from the manway on the VMSX 310119 while at the Balmer railyard on 9/8/23. The car was isolated for inspection. Hazmat responders identified the release as coming from the manway sealing area underneath the cover. Upon inspection it was found that the manway gasket had not been applied resulting in a small release of diesel fuel to the car body. Crews added a gasket and secured the car. Release loss estimates are based upon visual observations of the responders.
